formula.name: 4th False Quasi Perpendicular
formula.reference: Xrn = Xr2 * Xr2 + Xi2 * Xi2 - 6 * Xr2 * Xi2 + Cr; Xin = Ci - 4 * Xr * Xi * abs(Xr2 - Xi2);
formula.perturbation: xrn = 4 * Xr2 * Xr * xr + 6 * Xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xr * xr2 * xr + xr2 * xr2 + 4 * Xi2 * Xi * xi + 6 * Xi2 * xi2 + 4 * Xi * xi2 * xi + xi2 * xi2 - 12 * Xr2 * Xi * xi - 6 * Xr2 * xi2 - 12 * Xr * xr * Xi2 - 24 * Xr * xr * Xi * xi - 12 * Xr * xr * xi2 - 6 * xr2 * Xi2 - 12 * xr2 * Xi * xi - 6 * xr2 * xi2 + cr; xin = ( - (4 * Xr * Xi)) * diffabs(Xr2 - Xi2, - 2 * xi * Xi + 2 * xr * Xr - xi2 + xr2) - (4 * Xr * xi + 4 * xr * Xi + 4 * xr * xi) * abs( - Xi2 - 2 * xi * Xi + Xr2 + 2 * xr * Xr - xi2 + xr2) + ci;
